title: Associate Data Analyst
intro: Advanced data analysts and data scientists are responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting extremely large amounts of data within organizations.
ifYouLike: exploring data, building models, finding insights

title: Data Analyst
intro: Gain the advanced knowledge to work with real-world datasets and improve business insights using machine learning models.
ifYouLike: analyzing data, building visualizations, solving business problems

title: Machine Learning Engineer
intro: Master machine learning concepts and techniques to build scalable models and contribute to AI projects.
ifYouLike: working on machine learning algorithms, solving complex data problems

title: Data Scientist with LLM
intro: Become a leader in the field of artificial intelligence with advanced knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and generative AI technologies.
ifYouLike: working with AI systems, creating models, developing full-stack AI solutions

title: Data Structure & Algorithms with System Design
intro: Learn the basics of software engineering, focusing on Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) and System Design to build a strong foundation.
ifYouLike: solving coding problems, designing scalable systems, understanding algorithms
